subject: Enhance Meta-Learning predictions UI and polish user experience
description:
Follow-up improvements for the Meta-Learning Engine predictions interface at /predictions

**Current Status:**
- ✅ PREDICTIONS tab navigation working
- ✅ API endpoints functional (CORS fixed)
- ✅ Basic predictions loading
- ✅ Learning Insights view complete
- ⚠️ Needs polish and enhancement

**Areas for Improvement:**

1. **UI/UX Polish:**
   - Improve prediction result visualization
   - Better loading states and transitions
   - Enhanced error handling and user feedback
   - More detailed quality score breakdown
   - Interactive charts for historical patterns

2. **Session History View:**
   - Currently shows "coming soon" placeholder
   - Implement temporal pattern visualization
   - Success trends over time
   - Cognitive correlation charts

3. **Real-time Features:**
   - Live updates as predictions refine
   - Progress indicators for multi-dimensional analysis
   - Confidence score visualization
   - Recommended research preview cards

4. **Integration:**
   - Link to related research findings
   - Quick actions (schedule task, start session)
   - Export predictions to session notes

5. **Performance:**
   - Cache frequently requested predictions
   - Optimize API calls when switching views
   - Lazy load historical data

**Files to Modify:**
- /Users/dicoangelo/OS-App/components/predictions/MetaLearningDashboard.tsx
- /Users/dicoangelo/OS-App/components/predictions/PredictionPanel.tsx
- /Users/dicoangelo/OS-App/libs/agent-core-sdk/src/hooks.ts

**Dependencies:**
- Qdrant vector search needs to be stable
- API server running on port 3847
- Session outcomes data (666+ records)

**Priority:** Medium (functionality works, but user experience can be significantly improved)
